caption.title: Scatter plot of mean within-host evolutionary rates and set-point viral load.
caption.p: For both gene regions, we estimated the mean within-host evolutionary rates for external, internal, and backbone branches at both nonsynonymous (filled circles) and synonymous (open circles) sites. The points are coloured according to subtype as per Fig 2. The solid and dashed lines indicates the best linear fit for nonsynonymous and synonymous substitution rates, respectively, and set-point viral load. Using a Pearson correlation test, we found no significant relationship between evolutionary rate and set-point viral load in this cohort.
